bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design, 1.5" lower HS bearing, threaded BB

components.description: Specialized Pro FACT carbon, monocoque construction, OS race for 1.5" bearing, full carbon legs, crown and steerer
Specialized Mindset, 1.5" lower bearing, integrated threadless, stainless steel sealed cartridge bearings, 8mm carbon cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
Specialized Pro SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
